item.title: HELEN OF TROY LTD 10-K
item.description: HELEN OF TROY LTD, which is in the Electric Housewares & Fans [3634] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 28, 2022 had 38301 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
